# Node.js dependencies (if you use Node.js)
node_modules/

# Logs
logs/
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE/editor-specific files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp

# Build directories (if you have a build process)
dist/
build/

# Cache files
.cache/
*.cache

# Environment files (if used)
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Images uploaded for background or logo
screenshot.png
